column8: Description
Name an element. Replace a card in the draft slot until you reveal a card of the named element. Draft a card.
At the beginning of the turn, draw a card

Untap all your Devices
Destroy up to 2 Minions with at most 1 life.
Put a Device from hand into play for free
When this Minion is damaged, damage up to 2 Minions by 1
When this Minion is damaged, you may untap one Device.
When this Minion takes a damage, draw a card
When this Minion takes a damage, damage all opponent Minions by 1
{{>T}}: Damage a non Device you control by 1. If the target receives damage, increase all damage you or any cards you control do by 1 until the end of your turn.
{{>T}}: Damage up to 2 Minions by 1
{{>T}}: Damage a non Device you control by 1. If the target receives damage, you may destroy up to 2 Minions with at most 1 life.
{{>T}}: Damage a non Device you control by 1. If the target receives damage, you may put a device from hand into play for free
{{>T}}: Damage a non Device you control by 2. If the target receives damage, draw 3 cards
{{>T}}: Damage a non Device you control by 2. If the target receives damage, +3 Energy
Reveal the top 4 cards of the deck. Put any Minions in hand, discard the rest or replace them in any order. Draw a card.
Draft a Minion into hand
Put a Minion in play back in your hand. Put a Minion in your discard pile with summoning cost at most one more of the summoning cost of that minion into play.
Draw a card from your discard pile
When a Minion you control enters play, you may take a card from your discard pile and put it on top of your deck
At the beginning of the turn, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any of them and put the rest back in any order.
When this Minion is about to receive a damage, you may redirect it to another Minion you control

{{>T}}: Draw a card. Every player discards the top card of their deck
{{>T}}: Put a card from your discard pile on top of the deck.
{{>T}}: Put a Minion in play back in your hand. Put another Minion with the same cost into play
Reduce energy cost of Spells by 1. Draw a card.
Pick a player. Reveal that player's hand. For every spell you have in play, discard a card you pick from that player's hand. Draw a card.
Damage a target by X, where X is the number of spells you have in play. Draw a card.
For every spell you have in play, tap a card. Draw a card.
Move a Minion you control back to the owner's hand. The owner gains the same amount of energy used to summon the Minion. Draw a card.
Shuffle your discard pile and put it on top of your deck. Draw a card.
Draw X cards, where X is the number of spells you have in play. Draw a card.
When you play a Spell, you may deal 1 damage to a target

Flying
This Minion's attack power is equal to the number of Spells you have in play
{{>T}}: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a spell, put it into play for free. Otherwise, put it in your hand.
{{>T}}: Take control a Minion with the same summoning cost as the number of Spell you have in play until the end of your turn.
{{>T}}: Draw a Card. Pick a player. Both you and that player take a card from hand and put it on top of the other playerâ€™s deck.
{{>T}}: Pick a Minion. Redirect that Minion's next attack causing up to X damage, where X is the number of Spells in play, to a target of your choice.
{{>T}}: Look at the top 4 cards of a deck. You may put any of them at the bottom of the deck in any order. Replace the rest of them in any order.

Pick a Minion. While this card is in play, increase its attack by X, where X is the number of Enchantments on that Minion. Untap that Minion.

Discard an Enchantment from play or from hand to redirect damage to this Minion.
